example.eg: Despite all my work, I still failed the exam.  I arrived on time despite the train strike.
example.egtrans: 尽管我做了种种努力，但还是没有通过考试。

example.eg: Despite all opposition, the couple were determined to get married.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 力排众议, 不顾所有人反对

example.eg: Thomas had slight leg injury, but, despite that, he managed to win the race.
Despite the fact that he had revised really hard, Billy could not answer a single question on the exam paper.
example.egtrans: 尽管他真的很努力地复习，但比利仍无法解出试卷上任何一道题。

example.eg: Liam has a heart condition; despite this, he is an active little boy.
example.egtrans: 利亚姆有心脏病。但尽管如此，他还是一个活泼的小男孩。
